articles.title: Hundreds of students displaced after burst pipe closes UMass Boston dorm
articles.description:
The university will reopen the East Residence dining hall starting Wednesday morning, UMass Boston said.

The post Hundreds of students displaced after burst pipe closes UMass Boston dorm appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Hundreds of UMass Boston students displaced due to a burst pipe in dormitory.
East Residence dining hall will reopen on Wednesday morning, February 14.
Displacement affects student housing and campus services in Boston.

articles.title: Seattle Public Library schools the Boston Public Library with book recommendations for Patriots fans
articles.description:
The book compilation has more than 35 titles, with one from former Seahawks defensive end Michael Bennett.

The post Seattle Public Library schools the Boston Public Library with book recommendations for Patriots fans appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Seattle Public Library shares over 35 book recommendations for Patriots fans.

Boston Public Library may enhance local offerings for sports enthusiasts.

articles.title: State auditor sues Beacon Hill to force compliance with audit
articles.description:
Diana DiZoglio’s action comes 15 months after nearly 72 percent of Massachusetts voters approved her authority to audit the Legislature.

The post State auditor sues Beacon Hill to force compliance with audit appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Diana DiZoglio sues Beacon Hill to enforce legislative audit compliance.
72% of Massachusetts voters approved her audit authority 15 months ago.
This lawsuit aims to increase transparency and accountability in state government.

articles.title: Man arrested in Seaport, charged with human trafficking
articles.description:

summary: Schineider Dave Macean, 23, arrested for human trafficking in Seaport.

The incident raises concerns about human trafficking in Boston's neighborhoods.

articles.title: As Boston residents report daytime coyote sightings, here’s how to stay safe
articles.description:
Winter marks the eastern coyote’s mating season, and Bostonians have spotted the animals across the city and up at all hours.

The post As Boston residents report daytime coyote sightings, here’s how to stay safe appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Residents report increased daytime coyote sightings across Boston during winter mating season.
Coyote sightings have been noted citywide, raising safety concerns for families and pets.
Local authorities advise residents on safety measures to minimize encounters with coyotes.

articles.title: Cam Newton reverses course with his comments on Drake Maye after Super Bowl loss
articles.description:
"With what we saw this year — it is only the beginning, not the end."

The post Cam Newton reverses course with his comments on Drake Maye after Super Bowl loss appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Cam Newton praised Drake Maye's potential after Super Bowl LX loss on February 10, 2026.
Newton emphasized that this season is just the beginning for Maye's career.
Boston residents may see increased interest in Maye as a future Patriots quarterback.

articles.title: Shootings at school and home in northeastern British Columbia leave 10 dead, including shooter
articles.description:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police said more than 25 people are injured, including two who were airlifted to hospital with life-threatening injuries, after the shooting at Tumbler Ridge Secondary School.

The post Shootings at school and home in northeastern British Columbia leave 10 dead, including shooter appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ten people, including the shooter, died in a shooting at Tumbler Ridge Secondary School.
More than 25 individuals were injured, with two suffering life-threatening injuries.
Boston residents may face increased discussions on school safety and gun control measures.
